CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c), IMAGE("../resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/green.png","GREEN", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "GREEN", IMAGE("../resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/green.png","GREEN", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "YELLOW", IMAGE("../resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/yellow.png","YELLOW", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "RED", IMAGE("../resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png","RED", 30, -1), "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Alert Flag External
